entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
